      • addSlot

        public ACAQSlotDefinition addSlot(String name,
                                  ACAQSlotDefinition definition,
                                  boolean user)
        Adds a slots
        Parameters:
        name - Unique slot name
        definition - Defines the slot
        user - if the change was triggered by a user. If false, checks for slot sealing, types, etc. do not apply

      • removeSlot

        public void removeSlot(String name,
                       boolean user)
        Removes the slot with given name
        Parameters:
        name - Slot name
        user - if the change was triggered by a user. If false, checks for slot modification, counts, etc. do not apply.
